name: incinium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows incineroar to upgrade darkest lariat into malicious moonsault.
short_effect: Held: Allows Incineroar to upgrade Darkest Lariat into Malicious Moonsault.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:

It upgrades Incineroar’s Darkest Lariat to a Z-Move.
